SD_HavenRomance_ROM.synopsis: Wyll's Romance scene in Act 2. The player gets to dance with Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM.how_to_trigger: - recruit Wyll; - go to act2;- reach haven;- have approval >10 (use origin debug book to setup wyll act2 romance scene)-  long rest;

MizoraFirstContact_SD.synopsis: Mizora appears in camp at night to Avatar Wyll to remind him of his goal: kill Karlach
MizoraFirstContact_SD.how_to_trigger: Play avatar Wyll. Sleep several nights after nautiloid crash.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_73.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches Wyll. Wyll is practing his dance moves, oblivious to the player's presence, lost in his reverie.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_71.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_71.text: Nice form. Where'd you learn to dance like that?

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll does a few more turns and steps, than faces the player and smiles.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_108.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_108.text: I've attended my share of fancy balls and masquerades. A few elegant moves can turn all the right heads.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_150.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_150.text: Figured it was time to brush up on my skills. I wouldn't want to fail my new partner.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_109.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_109.text: Stay quiet, and watch Wyll dance.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_167.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_167.text: Oh! Sorry. I didn't see you standing there. Lost in the steps, truth be told.
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_167.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll conintues dancing, unware of the player, then is startled to see player standing in front of him and stops.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_160.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_160.text: I need them to be just right. I wouldn't want to fail my new partner.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_52.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_52.text: A new partner? And who might that be?

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_13.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_13.text: As luck would have it, they just arrived.
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_77.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_77.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bowing, holding out his hand offering to dance.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_154.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_154.text: I'd like to, but I'm afraid I'll trip over my own feet.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_50.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_50.text: Don't worry. It's not really about the dance. It's about who's we're dancing with.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_131.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_131.text: Are you sure? I've been rehearsing, you know. I'd hate to put all that effort to waste.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_113.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_113.text: Dance with a devil? Most certainly not.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_96.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_96.text: Cocky, don't you think? Threaten my life, then try to cosy up after?

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_151.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_151.text: I deserve that. And I wish I could give more than 'sorry's in return.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_166.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_166.text: But I count you as a friend. My closest, in all honesty. Please - dance with me. If we must burn with the Hells' fires, let us burn together.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_142.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Player smiles and bows, taking Wyll's hand. Wyll turns guiding the player into the the center of the imaginary dance floor he was using to practice at the start of the scene.

Wyll releases the player's hand, and the two assume courtly posture oppsite eachother.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll stomps, assuming a paso doble stance. Perfect lines. Intense. He takes a few rhythmic steps foward, playfully invading the player's space while maintaining eye contact.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player performs a simple dance move and smiles at Wyll.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player attempts a dance move but trips a bit, then smiles at Wyll

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_2.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_2.text: Ha ha - ahem. Don't you worry. It takes years to master the Vollante.
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_2.context: NodeContext: voh-LAHNT. (A dance I made up.) Wyll is gently amused that the player fell when dancing.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_57.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_57.text: You're a beautiful dancer. I'm sure you'll teach me in no time.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_168.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_168.text: I'll show you everything I know, and then some - I promise.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_117.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_117.text: But perhaps we might try a more intimate style.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_86.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_86.text: Don't you worry, you were a joy to witness. But perhaps we might try a more intimate style.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_46.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_46.text: Well, not all of us were born with silver spoons in our mouths.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_98.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_98.text: Fair enough. Perhaps a less energetic style would suit you better.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_27.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_27.text: Gather your strength and leap into the air.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player leaps gracefully into the air and lands with aplomb.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player bows and Wyll smiles as he looks on.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_15.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_15.text: Now perhaps we might try a more - intimate style.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_116.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll begins a slower dance and the player follows suit.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The players come closer together until their lips are a hair away of touching.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_119.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kisses Wyll, then pulls away.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_139.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_139.text: So much shadow around us. To think I almost missed the light.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_51.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_51.text: Well - it's getting late. We can't face the morrow if we don't bid farewell to the now.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_31.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_31.text: I was hoping we might spend the night... together.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_88.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_88.text: I'm tempted, trust me. I thought my heart might burst with every step.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_122.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_122.text: But I still keep faith in the old tales of love, the once-upon-a-times and the happily-ever-afters.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_103.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_103.text: I'd like to do this the proper way. The way of the old romances sung by the bards.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_136.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_136.text: Till next time, good night - and dream sweetly.
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_136.context: NodeContext: Said with a romantic wink.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll smiles, turns, and walks away.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_130.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kisses Wyll - he kisses back, then pulls away.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_43.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_43.text: *Sigh.* I've drunk wines from Daggerford to Cormyr, but I've never known a taste as rich as yours.
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll smiles after your kiss.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_141.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_141.text: Gods damn it. You almost make me forget myself.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_25.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_25.text: Good night. And thank you. For the dance, I mean. I won't forget it.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll turns and walks away, looks back as though he wants to say something, then turns back around and leaves the player on their own.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_53.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_53.text: Invite him closer with a knowing look - it's what you both want.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_148.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll pushes his lips against the player's, then pulls away.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll and the player step away from each other. After an awkward moment, he smiles.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_37.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_37.text: This has gone too far. I should take my leave.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_112.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_112.text: I mean - yes, of course. The sun only rests for so long.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_137.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_137.text: Thank you. For the dance, I mean. I won't forget it.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_65.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_65.text: I'd burn you if I kissed you now, Wyll. No matter how much I want to.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_94.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_94.text: Forgive me. I was... caught up in the moment. But look - not a cinder on me.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_5.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_5.text: You have more control than you give yourself credit for.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_99.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_99.text: No need to be modest, you were a delight to behold.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_147.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_147.text: It wasn't hard. You just make it look hard.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_79.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_79.text: Indeed? Well let's see how you fare with a more - intimate style.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_121.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player leaps into the air, but then stumbles, rights themselves, and smiles at Wyll.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_76.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_76.text: Twirl about with flair and abandon.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_22.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_22.text: Twirl about with flair and abandon.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player does a fun but expertless twirl and smiles at Wyll.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_80.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_80.text: Beats all that fancy flitting around you were doing.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_173.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_173.text: Does it now? Then let's see how you fare with a less - energetic style.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player starts to twirl but then stumbles and takes a moment to straighten themselves out.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_161.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_161.text: Give a twirl. A calm twirl.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_118.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_118.text: Stay still and shake your head.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll stands and takes a normal position.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_23.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_23.text: Bashful tonight, are we? Perhaps you will take to a more - relaxed style.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_110.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_110.text: I don't know. I'm not much of a dancer.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_21.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_21.text: You don't have to be. Just follow my lead.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_4.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_4.text: Sorry, but it's a firm 'no' on this one.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_95.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_95.text: I think we should just call it a day.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_107.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll takes the hint, this dance is not going to happen. He straightens himself.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_7.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_7.text: Wyll, I'd love nothing more than to dance with you. But I fear I'd burn you to a crisp.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_124.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_124.text: About that. You only burn hottest when your emotions are aflare, right? Anger, excitement, fear... but a dance can be meditative. Calming.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_170.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_170.text: If you think you can put your hand in mine without singeing it off, I'm willing to try.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_8.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_8.text: I could try. If you're up for it.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_93.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_93.text: I'm surprised you'd ask. Thought maybe a part of you was still suspicious of me.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_134.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_134.text: You've more than proven just how wrong I was about you. I'd make the same decision a thousand times, even knowing the consequences.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_106.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_106.text: As charming as that sounds, I don't want to give you the wrong impression.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_28.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_28.text: Trust me. I don't think you could fail anyone if you tried.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_100.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_100.text: I know a few people who might beg to differ. But the only one that matters is here with me now.
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_126.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_126.text: Keep practising. I'm sure you'll get better... eventually...

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_129.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_129.text: Maybe. But I'm not so keen to perform solo. A duet's always been more my style. Which is to say -
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_129.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll bows after the line and extends his hand in front of him to the player.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_133.speaker: Player
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_133.text: It's like watching a beached flounder flop back to the sea. Is that the idea?

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_36.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_36.text: Oh goodness. Is it all that bad? I'm dreadfully out of practise.

SD_HavenRomance_ROM_64.speaker: Wyll
SD_HavenRomance_ROM_64.text: No better time to brush up on my skills, then. It would do me no good to fail my new partner.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle is drawn on the ground behind Wyll. A devilish figure rises from it and spreads her wings wide. It is Mizora, the cambion whoholds Wyll's soul-pact.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_72.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_72.text: Mizora. I'm surprised it took you this long to stop by.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_9.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_9.text: Hells - a devil. This must be a bad dream...

MizoraFirstContact_SD_22.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_22.text: Remind me - what should I be doing?

MizoraFirstContact_SD_21.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_21.text: She's still in the Hells. I need to get back there.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_60.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_60.text: I don't care about the deal. I just want this thing out of my head.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_57.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_57.text: I know the terms of our bargain. I'll find Karlach and kill her.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_6.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_6.text: The Sword Coast is in danger. I'll send this damned fiend back to the Hells.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_51.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_51.text: I have bigger problems now, if you haven't noticed.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_10.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_10.text: You can shove the deal up your own arse.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_3.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_3.text: What do you know - I was just thinking about you.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_58.speaker: Narrator
MizoraFirstContact_SD_58.text: *It is a fitful night, haunted by the bitter memories of the past.*
MizoraFirstContact_SD_58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll tosses and turns in his sleeping bag.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_12.speaker: Narrator
MizoraFirstContact_SD_12.text: *Memories of your father - Grand Duke Ulder Ravengard - and his diplomatic mission to Elturel. Memories of the diabolical bargain you made to save Baldur's Gate in his absence...*

MizoraFirstContact_SD_64.speaker: Narrator
MizoraFirstContact_SD_64.text: *...Memories of your father casting you, his Hells-touched son, out of your beloved city.*

MizoraFirstContact_SD_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle is drawn on the ground behind Wyll. A devilish figure rises from it and spreads her wings wide. It is Mizora, the cambion whoholds Wyll's soul-pact.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll sits up, facing Mizora. He remains seated, speaking to Mizora throughout.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_20.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_20.text: My poor little pupster. A free trip on a mind flayer machine, and all you've got is a brain-bug to show for it.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_27.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_27.text: Mizora. I'm surprised it took you this long to stop by.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_37.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_37.text: Come knocking before you've settled in? I may be half-devil - but I'm no monster.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_1.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_1.text: Hells - a devil. This must be a bad dream...

MizoraFirstContact_SD_4.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_4.text: Half-devil, hon - and I'm no dream. But if I were, I'd be the baddest.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_38.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_38.text: Sweet spot you've found for yourself. But I wouldn't get too cosy. After all, we've got a deal.
MizoraFirstContact_SD_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora looks around, pleased with what she sees.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_42.speaker: Narrator
MizoraFirstContact_SD_42.text: *Another memory seizes your mind. You race through the burning wastes of Avernus.*

MizoraFirstContact_SD_17.speaker: Narrator
MizoraFirstContact_SD_17.text: *Just ahead, the diabolical figure called Karlach cuts through demonic invaders, her single horn blazing in flame. You are the hunter, and she is your prey.*

MizoraFirstContact_SD_46.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_46.text: Remind me - what should I be doing?

MizoraFirstContact_SD_70.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_70.text: Killing the fiend known as Karlach. She's been a thorn in the archdevil Zariel's side.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_32.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_32.text: But she's not just the Hells' problem now. She fled Avernus on the same ship you hitched a ride on.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_26.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_26.text: She's still in the Hells. I need to get back there.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_11.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_11.text: Karlach's not just the Hells' problem now. She fled Avernus on the same ship you hitched a ride on.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_52.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_52.text: Wild little thing. You don't find her and cut her down, she'll burn the whole Coast to ash.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_33.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_33.text: And I know the famed Blade of Frontiers would never stand for that.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_39.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_39.text: I know the terms of our bargain. I'll find Karlach and kill her.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_45.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_45.text: Obedient thing - I love to see it.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_49.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_49.text: The Sword Coast is in danger. I'll send this damned fiend back to the Hells.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_8.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_8.text: That's the spirit. Go get her, tiger.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_67.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_67.text: Good boys get treats. Bad boys? Well - let's not think about that 'til we need to.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_50.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_50.text: Be a good boy. Bring me her head for dessert - I've a sweet tooth, and devil's on the menu.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora sinks back though her circle and Wyll sits, looking ahead, as the scene fades.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_24.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_24.text: I have bigger problems now, if you haven't noticed.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_61.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_61.text: I won't lie, pet - you drew a lousy hand. But folding's not an option when your soul's on the line.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_15.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_15.text: You can shove the deal up your own arse.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_53.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_53.text: Yelp all you want - you belong to the Hells.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_69.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_69.text: I don't care about the deal. I just want this thing out of my head.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_48.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_48.text: Karlach's fled Avernus on the same ship you hitched a ride on.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_35.speaker: Player
MizoraFirstContact_SD_35.text: What do you know - I was just thinking about you.

MizoraFirstContact_SD_55.speaker: Mizora
MizoraFirstContact_SD_55.text: You missed me? How sweet. The best bloodhounds are always the most loyal.
